questions.question: Which of the following is considered a 'Health Promotion' responsibility of the household?

options.text: Taking a sick child for immunization

questions.explanation: Building social capital is a promotive action. Latrines are prevention, immunization is care seeking.

questions.question: Select all actions that fall under 'Disease Prevention' for households:
Households have a responsibility to demand health and social entitlements (rights) as citizens.
questions.explanation: True. Claiming rights and demanding accountability is a key governance role of the household.
